basics.name: Tyler Chinen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

courses: Introduction to Computer Science I and II
Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I and II

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Fushiminomiya Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Office of Sudent Equity, Excellence, and Diversity
awards.summary: Awarded to deserving UH students as determined the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

awards.title: Manoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Award for undergraduate students who maintain a GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade.
